formula: a(n) = (n*(n-2)^2+n^2)/2.E.g.f.: exp(x)*x*(1+x^2/2). - _Paul Barry_, Sep 14 2006a(n) = sum((binomial(0,0*j)+binomial(n,2)),j=0..n). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Sep 04 2006G.f.: x*(1-2x+4*x^2)/(1-x)^4. - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 02 2008
